title: Biden to Deliver State of the Union Address on March 1
sub_head: Speech comes as president tries to rally support for his agenda with lawmakers and voters heading into midterm elections
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”President Biden plans to deliver his State of the Union address to Congress on March 1, as he tries to rally support for his agenda with lawmakers and voters headed into the midterm elections.
House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D., Calif.) formally invited Mr. Biden to give the speech on that day in a letter Friday. White House spokeswoman Karine Jean-Pierre later told reporters aboard Air Force One that Mr. Biden had accepted the invitation.
